mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, usercode, RegNo, mtype, blfl, bc, status, isprint, usertype, organization, doctor, nurse, assistant
mapper.insert: insert into KQDS_MEDICALRECORD (SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, usercode, RegNo, mtype, blfl, bc, status, isprint, usertype, organization, doctor, nurse, assistant) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isprint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update KQDS_MEDICALRECORD
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RegNo = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mtype = #{mtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
blfl = #{blfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bc = #{bc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isprint = #{isprint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nurse = #{nurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assistant = #{assistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_MEDICALRECORD set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RegNo = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mtype = #{mtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blfl = #{blfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bc = #{bc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isprint = #{isprint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurse = #{nurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assistant = #{assistant,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select p.DEPT_ID docdept,odept.dept_name as organizationname, m.SEQ_ID, m.usercode, m.createuser, p.user_name as createusername, m.blfl, m.bc, m.mtype, m.createtime, m.status, userd.username, reg.regdept, reg.regsort from KQDS_MEDICALRECORD m LEFT JOIN KQDS_REG reg on m.RegNo=reg.SEQ_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON p on p.SEQ_ID=m.createuser LEFT JOIN KQDS_UserDocument userd on m.usercode=userd.usercode LEFT JOIN SYS_DEPT odept on odept.dept_code = m.organization and odept.dept_parent = '0' where 1=1
and m.usercode = #{usercode}
and m.status in (${status})
and m.mtype in (${mtype})
ORDER BY m.CreateTime desc
select max(seq_id) as maxblcode from KQDS_MEDICALRECORD where 1=1 and seq_id like '%BL%' and organization = #{_parameter}
